nodes.text: The Damask-4 duelist sword was a model of vibrosword produced by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc.. The sword was available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire and cost 750.
The Damask-4 duelist sword was first mentioned and depicted in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
